verses.name: John 8:9
verses.text: And they which heard it, being convicted by their own conscience, went out one by one, beginning at the eldest, even unto the last: and Jesus was left alone, and the woman standing in the midst.

verses.name: John 8:10
verses.text: When Jesus had lifted up himself, and saw none but the woman, he said unto her, Woman, where are those thine accusers? hath no man condemned thee?

verses.name: John 8:11
verses.text: She said, No man, Lord. And Jesus said unto her, Neither do I condemn thee: go, and sin no more.
